title: I think we all know who the true MVP of URF is.
body:
{{champion:127}} 

0.6 second CD on Q at max rank, 28% movement speed perma-slow.

2.4 second CD on E, go nuts tricking people like Shaco over where you're going.

Can outpush practically anyone with Q alone.

Ult makes it where assassins the second they step within range will get stunned and deleted.

W can totally screw over melee champions with the root.

Yes, she has a shorter range, but dive in with E and go screw things up.

I think she's the true MVP of URF here.

Because that ult, man can it screw people.
